title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 801.1 - Adopting order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 801.1 - Adopting order

State Regulations

Pursuant to the authority contained in article 6 of the

Public Health Law, the Water Pollution Control Board, having made proper
studies and having held a public hearing on due notice with reference thereto, hereby adopts and assigns the following classifications and standards of
quality and purity to the various waters as specifically designated and
described below and subject to the definitions and conditions as
stated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
801.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
